Best Buddies Participation in the Fourth Al-Hidaya Training Forum
26  April,  2024
Best Buddies Qatar participated in the fourth Al-Hidaya Training Forum with an informative lecture about the programs and services it offers, the membership process, and the dissemination of Best Buddies' vision and mission as part of its societal role in raising awareness about issues and rights of persons with disabilities and highlighting its influential role in this aspect. Best Buddies was also honored by Al-Hidaya School for delivering the lecture, which was attended by more than 30 parents, specialists in the field, and school administrators.
